Public NotInheritable Class GenerateBootstrapper Inherits TaskExtension

summary.span: 实现 GenerateBootstrapper 任务。

span.span: Implements the GenerateBootstrapper task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 GenerateBootstrapper 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the GenerateBootstrapper element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [GenerateBootstrapper 任务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca3ba2c6-d2ea-41f2-b7e3-0fc2b0730460)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateBootstrapper Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca3ba2c6-d2ea-41f2-b7e3-0fc2b0730460).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此名称将显示在引导程序在安装过程中使用的 UI 中。This name will appear in the UI the bootstrapper uses during installation.

summary.span: 获取或设置在目标计算机上安装组件时，该组件是否使用提升的权限运行。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a component runs with elevated permissions when it is installed on a target computer.

value.span: 返回如果已安装的组件在运行使用提升的权限; 否则为。

span.span: Returns if the installed component runs with elevated permissions; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置在项目文件中，但不是会公开 MSBuild 架构中。This property can be set in the project file, but it is not exposed in the MSBuild schema. 项目文件中`MsiBootstrapper`部分中，设置[RequiresElevation 属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f449071-9caf-46e7-b7d4-7bbc21cf9aa7)到`True`。In the project file's `MsiBootstrapper` section, set the [RequiresElevation Property](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f449071-9caf-46e7-b7d4-7bbc21cf9aa7) to `True`. 时它将写入注册表项或安装到 GAC，则将运行一个组件使用提升的权限。A component runs with elevated permissions when it writes a registry key or is being installed to the GAC. 例如，如果程序集安装到 GAC 中，您需要将此属性设置为`True`。For example, if you are installing assemblies to the GAC, you need to set this property to `True`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个位置，以供引导程序查找要安装的安装必备组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

value.span: 供引导程序查找要安装的安装必备组件的位置。

span.span: The location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有以下值::This property can have the following values:: - `HomeSite`：指示必备组件正由组件供应商联系托管。`HomeSite`: Indicates that the prerequisite is being hosted by the component vendor. - `Relative`：指示必备组件位于应用程序的同一位置。`Relative`: Indicates that the preqrequisite is at the same location of the application. - `Absolute`：指示所有组件在集中式 URL 处找到。`Absolute`: Indicates that all components are to be found at a centralized URL. 此值应与结合使用`ComponentsUrl`属性。This value should be used in conjunction with the `ComponentsUrl` property. 如果未指定 ，则默认情况下使用 `HomeSite`。If is not specified, `HomeSite` is used by default.
